name: Liga Polska
overview: Liga Polska is a Polish language football management game. The game allows the player to select one team of a fifty two available. The player may choose start year, although the game begins always in the second league stage. The game covers national backyard and European cups. The player as a manager decides on sponsors and ticket prize, footballers transfers, stadium facilities, composition of the team, planning tactics for each match and intensity of training. During the match all the interesting situations are presented in the form of isometric video animation. There is no match commentary included. The club's finances consist of revenues from tickets, transfers, advertising and expenditure on salaries and taxes.
